s: The Caavo Companion app allows Caavo to work with your Fire TV.

The Caavo Companion app allows Caavo to work with your Fire TV. Please note, this app works behind the scenes so you can use Fire TV with Caavo -- the app does not include any features to interact with. Caavo users should simply download the app and connect your Apple TV to Caavo.
